constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 187 (Monday, October 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DEUTCH:
H.R. 5713.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 3 of the United States
Constitution; Article 1, Section 8, Clause 8 of the United
States Constitution; and Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18 of
the United States Constitution.
[Page H5873]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

title: Protect Working Musicians Act of 2021
